title: Tiny Baby Stoat Has The Best Reaction When She Meets Someone Like Her | The Dodo Little But Fierce
author: The Dodo
description:
At less than 4 weeks old, Whisper was abandoned by her mom. Robert cared for her around the clock, but what she really needed was a friend like her. Then another baby stoat named Stuart came along. Watch the moment they meet!

Check out more of Robert E Fuller's work on YouTube: http://thedo.do/fuller527.


Introducing Dodo swag!  https://shop.thedodo.com/

localize.description:
